name: places/ChIJ3w-2Q4FZwokRktq8UQnQxJ4
formattedAddress: 137 Essex St, New York, NY 10002, USA
adrFormatAddress: 137 Essex St, New York, NY 10002, USA

originalText.text:
While staying in NYC, I was in the mood for a hookah. The place a friend recommended was closed at 11 so I found the nearest place with Hookah.

The staff was nice and attentive, and replaced the coals quickly upon asking. It was also the quickest hookah to come out ... like literally 4 or 5 minutes.

However.... if you are used to smoking nicer German or Russian hookahs and dark leaf shisha.... this is probably going to disappoint you. The actual hookah kept having issues and wouldn't allow me to purge until I jiggled the blow off valve ... every few minutes. Even the strongest Shisha doesn't usually hurt my throat but there was something off about this one. It's much more traditional than I'm used to ....

Apparently, the Shisha served in NYC needs to not contain any nicotine so maybe it was that.

Al Fakhar Shisha was $40 and the few offerings from Adalya (Love 66) and Blue mist from a brand I'm forgetting off the top of my head were $45.

With the premium Hookah, one Rum and Coke and automatic 18% gratuity on the bill...  it was about $76.

Would I visit again? .... maybe ... if I was nearby and craved a hookah that could be described as ... eh.

originalText.text: It‚Äôs a nice place with good background music, the drinks are good, if you are going to get a hookah save yourself the trouble and just get a pineapple head. It is 10 times better than the normal Hookah. I can‚Äôt speak for all the food because I only got one item on their menu, but the shrimp tacos are amazing. If you like spicy, you‚Äôll love this.

originalText.text:
I HAVE GIVEN THIS PLACE 3 chances already and it just always disappoints. HORRIBLE SERVICE FROM THE SECURITY TIL THE SERVER. I always have to ask other employees for drinks, refills & hookah & if they‚Äôre not the designated server, they always respond with ‚Äúyou have to ask your server‚Äù ‚Äúi dont know‚Äù‚Ä¶ the least they could do is tell our server to come by. There‚Äôs only 3 other tables to attend, place is empty, it shouldn‚Äôt take 35 minutes (we counted) to stop by and ask if we need anything.

Horrible service, food and cocktails. I usually order beers and they‚Äôre not even cold. The food tastes like it‚Äôs frozen food that they just microwave in the back and again takes forever to come out.

My group of friends & I are officially done trying this place.

originalText.text:
Let‚Äôs start with the highlights: the music was good, the wings were even better, & the ambiance is nice for a date.

The areas of growth: the air conditioning is nonexistent which is not great for summer time, the drinks were weak, & the service needs some major improvement.
